H0.text: BRN is the international vehicle registration for which country. Brazil

H1.text: BRN is the international vehicle registration for which country. Brunei

H2.text: BRN is the international vehicle registration for which country. Burma (Myanmar)

H3.text: BRN is the international vehicle registration for which country. Bahrein

A4.text: Vehicle registration plates are displayed on all motorised road vehicles in Brunei, as required by law.
